remarks: Lemmma for ~~? mapdh .  Part (2) in [Baer] p. 45.  The bidirectional version of ~ mapdheq2 seems to require an additional hypothesis not mentioned in Baer.  TODO fix ref.  TODO:  We probably don't need this; delete if never used.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
